# Overview


## Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
lc_terrain = read_csv("../data/fabdem/staticTerrain_LC.csv")
fisl_terrain= read_csv("../data/fabdem/staticTerrain_FISL.csv")
```


```{r}
fisl_old = read_csv("../data/combustion_data_layers/FISL/static/staticTerrain_FISL.csv")
```


## Compare old and new calculations

```{r}
fisl_terrain %>% 
  select(-`.geo`, -`system:index`) %>%
  filter(ID %in% c("FISL_243", "FISL_244", "FISL_245", "FISL_246", "FISL_247"))
```



```{r}
fisl_old %>% 
  select(-`.geo`, -`system:index`) %>%
  filter(ID %in% c("FISL_243", "FISL_244", "FISL_245", "FISL_246", "FISL_247")) %>%
  mutate(slope_rad = slope * pi / 180, 
         aspect_rad = aspect * pi / 180)
```
